data.title: Office Pride Commercial Cleaning Services
data.meta_description: If you're looking for a local commercial cleaning service, look no further than Office Pride of Sevierville-Pigeon Forge.
data.text:
Before finding Office Pride, Jason Jain was a certified commercial truck driver. He then moved to Gatlinburg, Tenn. and became the general manager of The Donut Friar, where he worked for 14 years. The Jains also have three sons together.

“I’m used to running a business in a high-volume tourist area and the unique challenges that it brings,” he says. “With Office Pride, we recognized a great opportunity to work with such a wonderful company.”

Office Pride of Sevierville-Pigeon Forge provides a full range of janitorial services to offices, warehouses, manufacturing facilities, medical facilities, schools, government buildings, churches, banks and other commercial properties. Services include sweeping and vacuuming, wet and dry mopping, secure trash removal, restroom sanitization, disinfection, dusting, blinds cleaning, restroom replenishment, glass cleaning and the cleaning of walls, ceilings and baseboards. Floor care, pressure washing and window cleaning services are also available.

The location will serve Sevier, Blount and Knox counties.
